TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時刪除 按鈕控制項中按下或呼叫的方法，但之後控制刪除的項目。The control raises the event when a Delete button in the control is clicked or the method is called, but after the control deletes the item. ([刪除] 按鈕就按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete"。)這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查刪除作業的結果。(A Delete button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of a delete operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此物件可讓您判斷受影響項目可能會發生任何例外狀況的數目。This object enables you to determine the number of items affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷已刪除作業所影響的項目數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, use the property. 若要判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您可以指出是否已設定處理中的事件處理方法的例外狀況屬性。You can indicate whether you have handled the exception in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 刪除作業期間發生的例外狀況和屬性設定為`false`、控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要存取已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位，請使用屬性。To access the key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 若要存取非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的項目，請使用屬性。To access non-key fields of the deleted item, use the property. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件，以判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the object to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. 物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便事件。The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

param.name: exception
param.span: 在執行刪除作業時引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: The exception that was raised when the delete operation was performed, if any.

param.span: 如果沒有引發任何例外狀況，請使用 。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式來初始化的新執行個體類別。You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 在引發事件時，這個建構函式主要會由控制項開發人員使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 參數的值。The value of the `e` parameter.| ||`false`。`false`.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所影響的刪除作業的項目數目，資料來源控制項所報告。Use the property to determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, as reported by the data source control. 這個屬性通常用來判斷是否正確數目的項目已刪除下列方式：This property is typically used to determine whether the correct number of items were deleted in the following ways: - 若要確認只有單一項目已刪除。To verify that only a single item was deleted. 有時撰寫不正確的 delete 陳述式可能會刪除多個項目。Sometimes an incorrectly written delete statement can delete multiple items. - 若要確認已刪除項目，是否刪除作業期間發生錯誤，但沒有引發例外狀況。To verify that an item was deleted if an error occurs during the delete operation but no exception was raised. - 若要確認已刪除項目，支援開放式並行存取的資料來源控制項時 (例如和控制項) 有其屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值。To verify that an item was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the and controls) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 此設定時，可能不會刪除已由其他使用者修改的項目。Under this setting, an item that has been modified by another user might not be deleted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，確認刪除作業期間已刪除項目。The following example shows how to use the property to verify that an item was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得刪除作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 在刪除作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)，否則為 。

span.span: The exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得已刪除作業期間引發的例外狀況，如果有的話。Use the property to get the exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況和您處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式中，設定中屬性`true`。If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 否則，控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件處理常式中處理刪除作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當刪除作業中引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出您是否處理事件時的例外狀況。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether you handled the exception during the event. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，會被視為處理，而且不會重新擲回的例外狀況。If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`、控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。The following example shows how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得刪除之項目的索引鍵。

span.span: Gets the key or keys for the deleted item.
The key or keys for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取的索引鍵欄位的值 (依指定屬性) 的已刪除的項目。Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted item. 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄已刪除的項目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性包含索引鍵的欄位。This property contains only the key fields. 若要存取非索引鍵欄位，請使用屬性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件，表示已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted item. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得刪除之項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。

span.span: Gets the non-key field values for the deleted item.

value.span: 刪除之項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。

span.span: The non-key field values for the deleted item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取已刪除項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄已刪除的項目。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items. > [!NOTE] > 雙向繫結運算式中使用時，才會填入屬性範本，例如範本。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the templates, such as the template. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的項目表示的物件。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted item. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不包含索引鍵欄位 (依指定屬性) 的已刪除的項目。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted item. 若要存取的索引鍵欄位，請使用屬性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已刪除項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。The following example shows how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsKeysVB.aspx#2)]
